text: Nurse (N3) said: "Most of the patient are critically ill. Most of them report to the hospital when their conditions have deteriorated. They first go to traditional healers for help." Nurse (N1) indicated that: "Even when patients are diagnosed with TB they will still go to traditional healers for help because they do not believe they are ill; rather they believe that they have been bewitched. Some of them won't even disclose their status to their family members because of fear of being stigmatized. Many people in deep rural areas lack understanding."
